overview: Dr. Mamdouh suffers from his wife's jealousy, although he is faithful,while his brother, Massoud has a wife who is always busy with the children. Ezzat, their cousin, advises them to follow his approach with his wife Saneya: he cheats on her, and at the same time showers her with love and respect.
tagline: Some Visit the Marriage Officiant Twice
title: Al Baad Yazhab Lil Maazoun Marratain
